Text.content: If only one element (typically a nested content with sub-elements) should appear in one tab, the element's name can be hidden. Therefore, set collapse="true". Otherwise, omit it, or set it to false.

Text.name: Text0
Text.content: Define the name shown in the tab. If the attribute is not given, the element's name is used as the tab name. To localize the tab name, use the key macro, e.g., place  %(key.{name of the key}). The key must reside in a workplace bundle.
